item.title: Manufacturing Data Hub
item.description: This article explains what the components of a Manufacturing Data Hub (MDH) are and why the system must have these particular components to meet the needs of large, modern manufacturing environments. In another phrasing, this article explains why Rhize made the choices it did to become the world’s first manufacturing data hub. However, the scope of this article is the design considerations that define an MDH in general. For introductory explanations about Rhize in particular, read What is Rhize?
